column5: 6 people MAX (no exceptions) Location: NRG Stadium is 29 mins away (Minimum traffic off 59 n) Close to IAH Airport. (8 miles away) Apt location is on N. Sam Houston Parkway E. to 3 mi to 59 s continue 15 mi to Tx288 south 610 to NRG  Plenty of restaurants/Stores.
